title: Placement by tapping in Geotrace and Geoshape widget used with Google maps doesn’t add points correctly between two exsting points
body:
**Software and hardware versions** 

Collect v2021.2.0
Android probably all

**Problem description**

When users chooses Google maps and goes to Geotrace widget ,uses placement by tapping and creates a trace with at least 3 points creating V-shape, and tries to add points between the last and the first point already added (if they are close and not connected), new points on the map are not created but the number of points entered changes.
In case of Geoshape widget the problem occurs when users added at least two points and tries to add a point close to an existing point.

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56479916/181771238-3faa1eec-1318-430d-b209-ab426317ff90.mp4


https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56479916/181771302-e1e0f7f4-f4d3-4b34-8fef-5222a0ec494c.mp4


**Steps to reproduce the problem**

1. Select Google maps as a source of maps.
2. Go to All widgets form.
3. Go to Geotrace widget.
4. Click „Start Geotrace”.
5. Click add points button and choose „placement by tapping”.
6. Click start.
7. Add at least 3 points creating V-shape.
8. Add points between the last and the first point (close to an existing point).


**Expected behavior**

User is able to add points between 2 points that are close to each other. Number of points entered changes and there are markers created.

**Other information**

I’ve also check on Android 8.1 and 11 Collect v2022.2.3 , Collect v2022.2.0 and Collect v2022.3 Beta 2 and it doesn’t work as expected. I haven’t checked earlier versions than Collect v2021.2.0.
